Key Match Events: Greece won 2-0 against Republic of Ireland
Bakasetas (48') and Mantalos (90+1') scored for Greece
Giannoulis (45+1') and Kourbelis (71') received red cards
Pre-Game Insights: Greece are on a four-match winning streak in all tournaments
Ireland head to Piraeus with a spring in their step following their own triumphant travails on their travels on Thursday night
Post-Match Reflections: Jovanovic's men made it four for four as they edge ever closer to a coveted spot in the top tier of the Nations League
Miscellaneous Highlights: Greece's victory marked a maiden win for Heimir Hallgrimsson as Ireland head coach
Ireland have never achieved back-to-back triumphs in the Nations League
Others: Greece will be without centre-back Konstantinos Koulierakis due to a one-match ban
Kostas Tsimikas is a question mark over Liverpool left-back
